pkgmetadata.longdescription: Several Examined and Concealed States-Dependent Speciation and Extinction // Simultaneously infers state-dependent diversification across two or more states of a single or multiple traits while accounting for the role of a possible concealed trait. See Herrera-Alsina et al. 2019 Systematic Biology 68: 317-328 DOI:10.1093/sysbio/syy057.
